title: [Large-scale] Dialogic Approach Workshop for Strengthening Experience-Based Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of foundational social studies courses and ability to organize personal experiences
context.additional_context: A reflective process connecting learners' individual job/internship experiences with social issues, deepening learning through peer feedback on asynchronous discussion platforms

learning_goals: Learners can systematically analyze their experiences using three types of dialogue (reflective, appreciative, generative)
Learners can propose two or more alternative solutions to social issues through asynchronous discussions with peers
Learners can create three or more visual representations of experience-based learning outcomes using the portfolio feature within the LMS
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
